pipelines.name: GenAI_Pipeline_on_CPU
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} ! decodebin force-sw-decoders=true ! tee name=split split. ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 ! videoconvert ! videorate drop-only=true ! video/x-raw,format=BGRA,framerate=1/1 ! gvagenai name=captioner device=CPU model-path="/home/pipeline-server/models/{parameters[captioner_model_name]}" generation-config="max_new_tokens={parameters[captioner_max_new_tokens]},num_beams=1,do_sample=false,repetition_penalty=1.1" scheduler-config="{parameters[captioner_scheduler_config]}" frame-rate=1 chunk-size=1 metrics=true ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! gvapython class=MQTTPublisher function=process module=/home/pipeline-server/gvapython/mqtt_publisher/mqtt_publisher.py name=mqtt_publisher ! gvametapublish name=destination ! fakesink sync=false split. ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 ! videoconvert ! videorate drop-only=true ! video/x-raw,format=NV12,framerate=30/1 ! appsink name=appsink sync=false max-buffers=1 drop=true

captioner-prompt.default: Describe what you see in the image in one sentence.

pipelines.name: GenAI_Pipeline_on_GPU
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} ! decodebin ! tee name=split split. ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 ! videoconvert ! videorate drop-only=true ! video/x-raw,format=BGRA,framerate=1/1 ! gvagenai name=captioner device=GPU model-path="/home/pipeline-server/models/{parameters[captioner_model_name]}" generation-config="max_new_tokens={parameters[captioner_max_new_tokens]},num_beams=1,do_sample=false,repetition_penalty=1.1" scheduler-config="{parameters[captioner_scheduler_config]}" model-cache-path="/tmp/ov_cache" frame-rate=1 chunk-size=1 metrics=true ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! gvapython class=MQTTPublisher function=process module=/home/pipeline-server/gvapython/mqtt_publisher/mqtt_publisher.py name=mqtt_publisher ! gvametapublish name=destination ! fakesink sync=false split. ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 ! videoconvert ! videorate drop-only=true ! video/x-raw,format=NV12,framerate=30/1 ! appsink name=appsink sync=false max-buffers=1 drop=true

captioner-prompt.default: Describe what you see in the image in one sentence.

pipelines.name: GenAI_Detection_Pipeline_on_CPU
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} ! decodebin ! tee name=split split. ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 max-size-time=0 max-size-bytes=0 ! videoconvert ! videorate drop-only=true ! video/x-raw,format=BGRA,framerate=1/1 ! gvadetect name=detection device=CPU model="/home/pipeline-server/detection_models/{parameters[detection_model_name]}/public/{parameters[detection_model_name]}/FP32/{parameters[detection_model_name]}.xml" threshold={parameters[detection_threshold]} ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 max-size-time=0 max-size-bytes=0 ! gvametaconvert format=json add-empty-results=false ! gvapython class=DetectionFilter function=process module=/home/pipeline-server/gvapython/publisher/detection_filter.py name=detection_filter ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 max-size-time=0 max-size-bytes=0 ! gvagenai name=captioner device=CPU model-path="/home/pipeline-server/models/{parameters[captioner_model_name]}" generation-config="max_new_tokens={parameters[captioner_max_new_tokens]},num_beams=1,do_sample=false,repetition_penalty=1.1" scheduler-config="{parameters[captioner_scheduler_config]}" frame-rate=1 chunk-size=1 metrics=true ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! gvapython class=MQTTPublisher function=process module=/home/pipeline-server/gvapython/mqtt_publisher/mqtt_publisher.py name=mqtt_publisher ! gvametapublish name=destination ! fakesink sync=false split. ! queue leaky=downstream max-size-buffers=1 max-size-time=0 max-size-bytes=0 ! videoconvert ! videorate drop-only=true ! video/x-raw,format=NV12,framerate=30/1 ! gvadetect name=detection_preview device=CPU model="/home/pipeline-server/detection_models/{parameters[detection_model_name]}/public/{parameters[detection_model_name]}/FP32/{parameters[detection_model_name]}.xml" threshold={parameters[detection_threshold]} ! appsink name=appsink sync=false max-buffers=1 drop=true

captioner-prompt.default: Describe what you see in the image in one sentence.

pipelines.name: GenAI_Detection_Pipeline_on_GPU
